name: GLOWBERT
description: A marine biologist working at the Starr Park aquarium, Glowbert is obsessed with sea life, wanting to introduce it to as many visitors as he can. Although he might seem a bit creepy, he’s actually a nice guy! Maybe.
descriptionHtml:
A marine biologist working at the Starr Park aquarium, Glowbert is obsessed with sea life, wanting to introduce it to as many visitors as he can.
Although he might seem a bit creepy, he’s actually a nice guy! Maybe.
